caption.p: Mean changes in ΔP 1−1 (black), ΔP 1−0 (red), and ΔP 0−1 (blue) (see Fig. 1b legend) across all simulations between anticipated conditions of the KNMI scenario, and baseline climatic conditions, for each site. Sites are sorted according to their mean annual temperature. n = 7,431 for each site. Site names as in Fig. 2.
